mapper.sql: id, name, detail, old_price, new_price, recommend, top_grade, user_id, type_id, sales_count, info, notice
mapper.insert:
insert into bus_product
id,
name,
detail,
old_price,
new_price,
recommend,
top_grade,
user_id,
type_id,
sales_count,

mapper.update:
update bus_product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
old_price = #{oldPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
new_price = #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT},
top_grade = #{topGrade,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sales_count = #{salesCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bus_product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_price = #{oldPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, new_price = #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, top_grade = #{topGrade,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sales_count = #{salesCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.detail, p.old_price, p.new_price, p.recommend, p.top_grade, p.user_id, p.type_id, p.sales_count, p.info, p.notice, p.created_date from bus_product p where p.id = #{id}

created_date = #{created_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
